details tab

Source: R/detailsTab.R
detailsTab.Rd

show a table or list for more details about the selected node.

detailsTab(tname, df, title, outdiv, nodeid, output, has_sy, helps = "")

Arguments

tname

string. name of the details data.
df

data.frame. details data.
title

data.frame. "id", "label", "term", "semantic_type", "group2", "group", "type", "category"
outdiv

list. tagList.
nodeid

string. node id.
output

output of shiny server.
has_sy

boolean. Default FALSE. synonyms table.
helps

string. Default "". Description about the data.

Value

a visNetwork plot.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
plot_network("df_edges", "dict.combine", "attrs", "colors_group")
}
